name: MMA Championship
description:
MMA Championship is a mixed martial arts fighting game that allows you to throw different types of strikes from standing and from ground position to beat up your opponent. you can either play against the computer in single player mode work your way through 6 opponents to become a MMA champion or challenge a friend in 2 player local

Key features:
. Free Content Updates
. Online Multiplayer
. Character Select
. PVP Mode

Note
. a controller is required for local multiplayer
